WorkItem.Description:
Occured when switching from an empty Healadin model to the Retribution model.
Using Rawr v2.2.13 with .NET 3.5 SP1 on Win XP SP2.
Â

Comments.Message: Can you provide any more detail on this? With a fresh copy of 2.2.13 I am unable to reproduce this issue.

I'm sorry, I also can't find a way to reproduce it again.

As far as I remember I just did the following steps when I got it:
- Opened Rawr, previousely selected model was Healadin.
- Switched to Retribution model.

There might have been something wrong in one of my data files because I also can't reproduce the gemming template issue I mentioned in the EJ forum after doing a complete wipe of program and application data files.
